v.0.1-alpha.description:
Initial Release

How to install:
1. Download [RoRML from Rainfusion](https://rainfusion.net/)
2. Run the program and go through the install prompt
3. Once installed, navigate to your Risk of Rain (2013) folder, open the "ModLoader" folder and extract the contents of the RoR_AP_Mod.zip file
4. Run RoRML Launcher again and the mod should be shown, enable the mod

NOTE: When generating DO NOT change the goal off of classic mode.  This setting is kept as a placeholder and will not generate properly on explore mode
v.0.1-alpha.title: 0.1a

v0.2-alpha.description:
Apworld Update
-
- Now goal type, teleporter fragment hunt
   - Enabled when `required_frags` is greater than 0
   - Locks access to the final stage until `required_frags` are obtained
 - Renamed some variables for future updates in yaml.  MAKE SURE TO UPDATE YOUR YAML

Mod Updates
-
- Updated Chat Relay to auto remove old entries.  
   - Only the latest 6 messages instead of oldest.
   - (Still recommended to use a text client for commands)
- Interacting with the divine teleporter without required teleporter frags will loop to the next stage, regardless of key press
- Added future support for stage unlocks.
v0.2-alpha.title: v0.2-alpha

v0.3.description:
New Additions:
-
- [AP World] Added map grouping
    - Adds item unlocks for each map, and gives each map it's own checks
- [Mod] Added a menu in game showing unlocked maps and how many checks are required when "tab" is pressed

Adjustments:
-
- [Mod] Teleporter will no longer let you teleport to final stage unless requirements are met
- [Mod] Slightly adjusted goal message display

Bug Fixes:
-
- [Mod] Fixed lag issue if on title/survivor selection screens too long
- [Mod] Goal message now renders properly on Risk of Rain
- [Mod] Goal message and chat box don't change font color when highlighting skills

Known bugs:
-
- Occasionally the tab menu will not show every stage.  Restarting the game tends to fix this.  
    - This seems to also effect what stages you can go to
- First run after startup after triggers any received meteor/combat traps
v0.3.title: v0.3

v0.3.2.description:
# New Additions
- [Client] Added toggle to override pickup step
- [Client] Item send messages are now colored
- [Client] [Experimental] Added stage portals that spawn near the teleporter after the teleporter event
    - Allows for the player to select which stage variant they want to go to next
    - Must be toggled on in the settings

# Balancing Tweaks
- [Client] Time warp trap nerfed from 5 min to 2 min

# Bug Fixes
- [Client] Previously sent traps no longer trigger on first run after restart
- [Client] Fixed issue of client trying to send checks for Risk of Rain on map grouping 
- [Client] Fixed enemy scaling being set to stage 2 on new game
v0.3.2.title: v0.3.2

v0.3.3.description:
# New Additions
- Ability to pick the next map from the teleporter
    - Replaces portal interactable entirely
- Added a obvious indicator when an item is sent

# Bug Fixes
- Ability to send checks on the final stage when on grouped mode
v0.3.3.title: v0.3.3

v0.3.4.description:
# Bug Fixes
- Teleporter giving the wrong stage selections
- Attempts to override stage in universal grouping
- Teleporter stage selection being available for universal grouping
v0.3.4.title: v0.3.4

v0.3.5.description:
# Bug Fixes
- [Mod] Fixed teleporter map choice not resetting back to random
- [Mod] Fixed non randomized maps (namely just modded maps) showing up in the tab menu
v0.3.5.title: v0.3.5

v0.4.description:
**New Yaml changes for this version, be sure to update yamls before genning**

# New Additions
- [AP World] Added Progressive Stages option
- [AP World] Added Require Stage option
- [AP World] Added Strict Map Requirements option
- [AP World] Added Divine Teleporter on Stage 5 option
- [AP World] Teleporter frag settings are now based on a percentage
v0.4.title: v0.4

v0.4-hotfix.description:
# Bug fixes
- [APWorld] Game not genning if required teleporter fragments is set to 0
v0.4-hotfix.title: v0.4-hotfix

v0.4.1.description:
# Balance Changes
- [Client] Time warp trap nerfed again and only adds 1 minute to the timer now
    - I swear this thing is so hard to balance and test....

# Bugfixes
- [Client] Not properly looping back to stage 1 under certain circumstances
- [Client] Teleporter map selection not working on gamepad
v0.4.1.title: v0.4.1

v0.4.2.description:
# Changes
- Updated lua-apclientpp.dll to latest version
    - Hopefully will fix crash error when connecting to the server..?
v0.4.2.title: v0.4.2

v0.4.3.description:
# Bug Fixes
- Ability to skip stages when `Strict Stage Progression` is disabled again
- Hid various debug lines
- AP messages in console log no longer have color formatting making them easier to read (in game this still prints as normal)
v0.4.3.title: v0.4.3

v0.4.4.description:
# Bug Fixes
- Fixed a bug where the game would crash whenever a bounce from the server was received
- Fixed a crash sometimes on slot connection
    - This *may* still give an error but at least should now be readable
v0.4.4.title: v0.4.4

v0.4.5.description:
# New Features
- Teleporter now will change midstage to allow you to enter the final stage if you got the final teleporter frags on said stage
    - Before you had to go to the next stage to get the correct tp.

# Bug Fixes
- Fixed a bug where the teleporter wouldn't let you go to the final stage on universal item grouping mode
- Fixed the teleporter not letting you go to the final stage unless you were on stage 5, even if you had `Divine Teleporter on Stage 5` turned off
- Prevented some stage override code from running when on universal item grouping mode
    - This *might* fix an issue where sometimes the tp would send you to the final stage but I'm really not sure
v0.4.5.title: v0.4.5

v0.4.6.description:
# Bug Fixes
- Item sends on map grouping mode work again (oops)
- Stage transitions in map grouping work again
v0.4.6.title: v0.4.6

v0.5.description:
# New Features
- Added deathlink
- Added ringlink
    - Current formula is `1 gold = 10 rings` scaled by difficulty
   
Note: both settings are enabled in the game client, not the yaml options
v0.5.title: v0.5

v0.5.1.description:
# Bug fixes
- [Client] Changed deathlink and ringlink `source` to be a unique id per instance
    - In theory, if you have multiple instances of ror1 on the same slot, it'll allow gold and deaths to be linked
    - Also fixes an interaction with SA2B, SADX and SMW that would cause those games to crash when ringlinks were sent
v0.5.1.title: v0.5.1

v0.6.description:
# New Features
- TrapLink
    - Currently only Time Warp Traps and Meteor Traps are linked
    - Linked Time Warp Traps are not permanent
    - Combat Traps have been omitted as they still don't really work quite right (and likely will be removed in the next apworld update)
- EquipLink
    - Links use items with other RoR1/Returns players
    
# Changes
- RingLink now no longer has a 0.1x ring:gold multiplier as it seemed a bit redundant with it's current difficulty scaling.
v0.6.title: v0.6.0

v0.6.1.description:
# Bug Fixes
- [Mod] Fix backwards compatibility with seeds genned prior to v0.4 ~~for the 5 people still playing seeds that old~~

# Internal Changes
- [Mod] "Time Warp Trap" now bounces it's actual name instead of "Timer Trap"
v0.6.1.title: v0.6.1

v0.6.2.description:
# Changes/Bugfixes
- Updated lua-apclientpp to 0.6.4
    - Should fix the ingame text client from displaying the wrong item/location ids now (should've been fixed like, 2 years ago when 0.5.0 released oops?)
